words.source: H1961 waw + Qal perf. 3ms of הָיָה 'to be, become'; KJV 'and it shall become', ESV 'and it shall become', NASB 'it will become'
H80 prep. l- + n.ms ʾavaq 'dust'; KJV 'small dust', ESV 'fine dust', NASB 'fine dust'
H5921 prep. ʿal 'over, upon'; KJV 'in', ESV 'over', NASB 'over'
H3605 n.ms constr. kol 'all, every'; KJV 'all', ESV 'all', NASB 'all'
H776 n.fs constr. ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'the land of', ESV 'the land of', NASB 'the land of'
H4714 proper name Mitsrayim 'Egypt'; all trans. agree
